import React from 'react'; import Moment from 'react-moment'; import ForecastExtra from './../weather/ForecastExtra.js'; import '../../styles/components/weather/_forecast.scss'; export default function WeeklyForecast({ forecast, toggleForecast, forecastExtra, toggleForecastExtra }) { return (
{ forecast.map((timeframe) => (
{timeframe.dt_txt}
{ Math.round(timeframe.main.temp) }
{timeframe.dt_txt}
{timeframe.main.temp}â„ƒ
  • {timeframe.wind.speed * 3.6} km/h {getWindDegrees(timeframe.wind.deg)}
  • {timeframe.main.humidity}%
)) }
) }
